fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Communication
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The GeoTLD Group is an association to represent (a) organizations who are operating a top-level domain that is based on a geographic name, geographic identifier or geographic origin with the purpose of serving the respective geographic region and (b) those who have been and/or are engaged and/or intend to be involved in the advocacy, promotion, provision, governance, implementation, deployment, popularization, research and development of top-level domains which are based on a geographic name, geographic identifier or geographic origin with the purpose of serving the respective geographic region.
